Honours (or Honors) Course?

Source: R/utilities.R
is.honours.Rd

Determine if a course is an honours course based on the course code (crse_code). The fourth character is an "H". This designation is based on the "Definitions of Course Characteristics" document provided on the Office of the Registrar's website.

Usage

is.honours(crse_code)

Arguments

crse_code

single character vector with the course code of interest.

Value

logical

Author

Emilio Xavier Esposito emilio@msu.edu (https://github.com/emilioxavier)

Examples

crse_code <- "183H"
is.honours(crse_code)
#> [1] TRUE
